text: The Song of the Old Days (; ) is a 1982 Armenian drama movie directed by Albert Mkrtchyan and starring Shahum Ghazaryan, Frunzik Mkrtchyan, Verjaluys Mirijanyan, Guzh Manukyan. == Other websites == * Category:1982 drama movies Category:Armenian movies Category:Movies directed by Albert Mkrtchyan
title: The Song of the Old Days
